user_query: Please fetch the current measurements in Los Angeles and generate a workout plan for me. I would like to focus on my biceps and triceps, and I have access to dumbbells and resistance bands. The workout plan should be for a duration of 60 minutes.

TaskList.description: Fetch the current weather measurements (temperature, humidity, etc.) in Los Angeles.
Generate a 60-minute workout plan focusing on biceps and triceps using dumbbells and resistance bands.
